title: BUILDINGLINK ANNOUNCES SCIENCE-BASED TARGET COMMITMENT FOR CARBON REDUCTION - PR Newswire
summary: BuildingLink has announced its validation of science-based targets to reduce emissions by 42% by 2030, demonstrating its commitment to climate action. The company plans to collaborate with various stakeholders to mitigate emissions and pursue renewable energy initiatives. CEO Zachary Kestenbaum emphasized the importance of transparency and accountability in their sustainability efforts. BuildingLink aims to lead the property management industry in decarbonization efforts.
